name: Nowhere to hide
description:
Made for the GMTK 2018 game jam (GENRE but you can't MECHANIC).

This game is an FPS without Cover. Bullets will pass stright through walls, and your weapon's secondary fire gives you xray vision to let you see the enemies.

Be warned though, as while using xray vision you will appear visible to the other players.

Escape will release your mouse, Escape + shift will close the game. (Sorry for the lack of UI).

Currently singleplayer, fighting against rather stupid bots.
